title: Low CGPA
content:
I'm currently in 5th sem and i have a low CGPA of 6  because of my health issues, is there any way to go atleast 7.8?
How should I study for it.

comments.body:
Assuming you have 92 credits and 6 cgpa after 4 sems,

even  you get an S grade for all the remaining credits (68), your cgpa would be 7.7 at the end of 8 sems 

the only way is to grind hard for the next 2 years
